sys_ux_client_script.name: Form screen status changed

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_e73e06431be455106a08a9b4bd4bcb13
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record">623e46031be455106a08a9b4bd4bcba1</macroponent><name>Form screen status changed</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    const {title, tooltipPreview, primaryItem, secondaryItems, hasUpdate, isDirty, status, screenParams} = event.payload;
    api.emit("SCREEN_STATUS_CHANGED", {
        title,
        tooltipPreview,
        primaryItem,
        secondaryItems,
        hasUpdate,
        isDirty,
        status,
        screenParams: screenParams ? { table: screenParams.table, sysId: screenParams.sys_id }: null
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>David.Admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-12 06:28:52</sys_created_on><sys_id>e73e06431be455106a08a9b4bd4bcb13</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Form screen status changed</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Working From Home (WFH)" source="x_852034_wfh">ca4c5dfd1ba811106a08a9b4bd4bcb1f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Working From Home (WFH)">ca4c5dfd1ba811106a08a9b4bd4bcb1f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_e73e06431be455106a08a9b4bd4bcb13</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>David.Admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-07-12 06:35:46</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
